source.name: Property Address Directory
source.description: PAD contains geographic information about NYC's tax lots, and the buildings on them. A key component  is a list of geographic identifiers associated with each tax lot. The list includes the buildings the lot contains;  the street addresses and non-addressable street frontages of each of those buildings; all of the street frontages of the lot not associated with buildings; and any Non-Addressable Place Names (NAPs) associated with the lot.
